You can mark Attendance of Children and Staff, share Photos and Videos, send One-Click Updates to Parents. Kriyo also gives all the Analytical Reports needed for you to grow your Business.

Kriyo is fast becoming the choice of Educators and is rated highly by Teachers and Parents alike.
Owners can manage their Schools, Teachers can save valuable time and Parents can better engage with their Child’s Learning. It is the most powerful & easy to use software in early education.

Feature Details:

• Affordable: You can download Kriyo App and signup for a FREE TRIAL. We also have a FREE version for all the basic needs of the Preschool / Childcare centre. Explore all the powerful features we built for you with the advanced PRO package. Licensing is on Pay-per-Use basis - No upfront commitments.
• Your Data is safe with us: We understand the importance of Privacy and Security that your precious data needs. We store everything related to children, staff and parents in secure Cloud storage. Login information is safely secured with Encryption
• Manage multiple branches: From the same Kriyo app, you can manage multiple branches/centers of your school. Flipping between schools is now just a click away.
• Customized Staff Permissions: As a School Owner(or Head), you can grant/restrict access to any Teacher/Staff for any feature or program based on your need. It can be changed any time.
• Enquiries & Admissions Management: Never miss out on a prospective admission. Add an enquiry, assign status using customisable labels, get followup reminders, send SMS/Email campaigns and much more.

• Photos and Video sharing: Click photos, record video and then tag students with one click to share these happy moments with parents.
• Activity Updates: Teachers can now send different activity updates in just a few taps. Parents will get instant updates with a notifications as soon you send an update.
• Observations: Make note of progress, achievements, and activities of a child with customizable tags and save them for School’s use.
• Child Daily Report: Parents get a personalized feed with live notifications as you send the updates through the day. Teachers also have exact same view of what a parent can see in their mobile app.

And many more exciting features getting added to the app soon!!!
KRIYO is THE No. 1 Early Education Management Platform, that is committed to continuous improvements and new features.

• History: Its your digital log book. See what updates you or your teachers have sent to the parents so far.
• Digital Notice Board: You can now digitally manage your Notice board. You can have notices specific to one or more programs. Archive or Delete it when its no longer relevant.
• Parent Communication: Receive and Respond to parent requests from the same app
• Calendar: View Birthdays of All Children & Staff and Create/Share Events and Holidays with Parents.
• Invoices & Receipts module: Send Fee bills to parents. Parents can view the fee bills in their mobile app and Receipts are auto created as soon as they pay the fee in their app itself.

And many more exciting features getting added to the app soon!!!
KRIYO is the most comprehensive Early Education Management Platform, that is committed to continuous improvements and new features.
descriptionShort: Comprehensive app to digitally manage Schools, Preschools and Childcare centers

creator: Little Soldiers Solutions Pvt Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Kriyo is the most comprehensive app for Schools, Preschools, and Childcare centres to easily manage all the day-to-day activities. It is free, easy to use and trusted by thousands of educators across 100+ countries.

How to use Kriyo?

You can download the Kriyo App, signup, and try it for FREE.

Who can use it?

Schools, Early education centres, Childcare Centers, Educators, Parents, Owners of Preschools, Playschools, Daycare centres, Montessori schools, Activity centres, and Tuition centres.

Why Kriyo?

Super easy to use - You can set up in just 5 minutes without any training
One-stop solution - once you have Kriyo, no need to waste money on paper diaries, enquiry forms, bus tracking devices or biometric devices. Kriyo has all the tools to manage everything digitally
No credit card is required to sign up and there are no hidden charges
We value your privacy and keep your data 100 % safe with us
Reliable - anytime you have a question or issue, we are just a message away
Manage multiple branches on the same platform, anytime and from anywhere

Be it online classes or Back to School, Kriyo has all the tools and technology needed to equip you to efficiently manage your school.

Juggling between paperwork, excel sheets, multiple apps, and WhatsApp groups? Switch to Kriyo and build the best educational ecosystem for your business.

How much does Kriyo cost?

To support educators to continue learning for children during the COVID-19 pandemic, we have offered Kriyo for FREE worldwide from 1 April 2021. While we continue to keep it free in India and certain parts of the world, we offer Kriyo at very affordable prices in other countries. You can check out our website https://ikriyo.com/ for pricing details and the latest offers. Our pricing is transparent and affordable and there are no hidden charges.
You can try the app for free, request a demo and ask for special discounts directly through the in-app chat.

What are the key benefits?

• Digitized Admission Process through sharing of digital inquiry forms with parents
• Hassle-free Fee Collection with automated fee reminders and digital receipts
• Seamless parent communication - share photos, videos, and documents on the go
• Contactless Check-in & Out for students and staff at no additional cost
• Share the workload and smartly collaborate with your team

At Kriyo, there is something for everyone with multiple options like a learning tracker, health updates, expense management, bus tracking, CCTV streaming, and a lot more.

We’ll keep adding new features, take feedback from users, and improve the app’s performance with each upcoming release!

title: Kriyo - School & Childcare App

creator: Little Soldiers Solutions Pvt Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Kriyo is the most comprehensive app for Schools, Preschools, and Childcare centres to easily manage all the day-to-day operations. It is super easy to use, secure, affordable and trusted by thousands of educators across 100+ countries.

Key Benefits of Kriyo

1. Send personalised updates to parents in a click
2. Automate the fee collection process
3. CRM to manage the admissions process
4. Contactless Check-in and out for students and staff
5. Inventory Management
6. Learning Management System
7. Digital calendar with timely reminders
8. Daycare Needs - Food, Diaper, Nap, Health
9. CCTV Live Streaming
10. Smart bus tracking
and a lot more in a single app

Save time and money and grow your school with Kriyo!

Don't juggle between paperwork, excel sheets, and multiple apps. Whether you are a growing school or a large chain with multiple centres, Kriyo has all the tools and technology to simplify your school operations. Switch to Kriyo now and build the best educational ecosystem for your business.

How to use Kriyo?

You can download the Kriyo School App, signup with your school details and try it for FREE.
Once you signup, click on the green colour chat button at the bottom right corner for all the training resources. It has a demo video and tutorials that help to get started at your convenience without any need for additional training. If you need any help, you can directly chat with us from the app itself or book a demo.

Who can use it?

Owners and teachers of Schools, Preschools, Montessori schools, Childcare Centers, Activity centers, and Tuition centers can use it to streamline all their day-to-day operations.
Parents get all the updates from school instantly on the Kriyo Parent App.

Why Kriyo?
Super easy to use - You can set up in just 5 minutes without any training
One-stop solution - once you have Kriyo, no need to waste money on paper diaries, enquiry forms, bus tracking devices or biometric devices. Kriyo has all the tools to manage everything digitally
Transparent - No credit card is required to sign up and there are no hidden charges
Secure - We value your privacy and keep your data 100 % safe with us
Reliable - anytime you have a question or issue, we are just a message away
Manage multiple branches on the same platform, anytime and from anywhere

How much does Kriyo cost?

You can try it for FREE for 14 days and then subscribe to a suitable plan. You can check out the Kriyo Subscription page in the app menu for some exciting offers.

More details...

• Digitized Admission Process through sharing of digital enquiry forms with parents
• Hassle-free Fee Collection with automated fee reminders and digital receipts. Parents can pay from anywhere using cards, net banking, and UPI and the amount will be credited directly to your bank account
• Seamless parent communication - share photos, videos, and documents on the go
• Track the learning progress of children and generate assessment reports
• Contactless Check-in & Out for students and staff at no additional cost
• Share the workload and smartly collaborate with your team while maintaining data safety
• Manage your school's inventory efficiently and plan ahead with the low-stock alerts feature

At Kriyo, there is something for everyone with multiple options like a learning tracker, health updates, expense management, bus tracking, CCTV streaming, and a lot more.
